```r
# join first and last variables with day 1 LENA data 
lena_d1 <-
  lena_d1 %>% 
  left_join(
    lena_time_cl %>% 
      select(
        ID, 
        ct_last, 
        ct_last_time, 
        aw_last, 
        aw_last_time,
        ct_first,
        ct_first_time,
        aw_first,
        aw_first_time
        ) %>% 
      distinct(ID, ct_last, .keep_all = TRUE),
    by = \ID\"
